Verses: 1 appozhudhu Ellaa Raanuva Servaikkaararum, Kareyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanum, Osaayaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yesaniyaavum, Siriyor Mudhal Periyormattumaana Sagalajanangalum Serndhuvandhu,

2 theerkkadharisiyaagiya Eremiyaavai Nokki: Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Naangal Nadakkavendiya Vazhiyaiyum, Seyyavendiya Kaariyaththaiyum Engalukkuth Theriyappannumpadikku, Neer Engal Vinnappaththukku Idankoduththu, Meedhiyaayirukkira Indha Sagala Janangalaagiya Engalukkaaga Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiyakarththarai Nokki Jebampannum.
3 ummudaiya Kangal Engalaik Kaangirapadiye Thiralaana Janangalil Konjappere Meendhirukkirom Endraargal

4 appozhudhu Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Sonnadhaik Ketten; Idho, Ungal Vaarththaiyinpadiye Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukku Maru Uththaravaaga Sollum Ellaa Vaarththaigalaiyum Naan Ungalukku Ondraiyum Maraikkaamal Arivippen Endraan.

5 appozhudhu Avargal Eremiyaavai Nokki: Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ummaikkondu Engalukku Solliyanuppum Ellaavaarththaigalinpadiyum Naangal Seyyaavittaal, Karththar Namakku Naduve Saththiyamum Unmaiyumaana Saatchiyaayirukkakkadavar.

6 adhu Nanmaiyaanaalum Theemaiyaanaalum Sari, Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththukku Naangal Keezhppadivadhinaal Engalukku Nanmaiyundaagumpadi Naangal Ummai Anuppugira Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Saththaththukkuk Keezhpadindhu Nadappom Endraargal.
7 paththunaal Sendrapinbu, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Eremiyaavukku Undaayitru.
8 appozhudhu Avan, Kareyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yogaanaanaiyum, Avanodirundha Ellaa Raanuva Servaikkaararaiyum, Siriyormudhal Periyormattum Undaana Sagala Janangalaiyum Azhaiththu,
9 avargalai Nokki: Ungalukkaaga Vinnappancheyyumpadikku Neengal Ennai Anuppina Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal,

10 neengal Indha Dhesaththile Thariththirundhaal, Naan Ungalaik Kattuven, Ungalai Idikkamaatten; Ungalai Naattuven, Ungalaip Pidungamaatten; Naan Ungalukku Seydhirukkira Theengukku Manasthaabappatten.

11 neengal Bayappadugira Baabilon Raajaavukku Bayappadavendaam, Avanukku Bayappadaadhiruppeergalaaga Endru Karththar Sollugiraar, Ungalai Ratchikkumpadikkum, Ungalai Avan Kaikkuth Thappuvikkumpadikkum Naan Ungaludane Irundhu,
12 avan Ungalukku Irangugiradharkum, Ungal Suyadhesaththukku Ungalaith Thirumbivarappannugiradharkum Ungalukku Irakkancheyven.
13 neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Saththaththukku Sevikodaamal, Naangal Indha Dhesaththile Irukkiradhillaiyendrum,

14 naangal Yuththaththaik Kaanaadhadhum, Ekkaala Saththaththaik Kelaadhadhum, Appaththaazhchchiyinaal Pattiniyaai Iraadhadhumaana Egipthu Dhesaththukke Poi, Ange Thariththiruppom Endrum Solveergaleyaagil,
15 yoodhaavil Meendhirukkiravargale, Adhaikkuriththu Undaana Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal; Neengal Egipthukkup Poga Ungal Mugangalaith Thiruppi, Ange Thangappoveergalaanaal.
16 neengal Bayappadugira Pattayam Egipthu Dhesaththile Ungalaip Pidikkum; Neengal Aiyappadugira Panjam Egipthile Ungalaith Thodarndhu Varum, Ange Saaveergal.

17 egipthile Thangavendumendru Avvidaththukkuth Thangal Mugangalaith Thiruppina Ellaa Manusharukkum Enna Sambavikkumendraal, Pattayaththaalum, Panjaththaalum, Kollainoyaalum Saavaargal; Naan Avargalmel Varappannum Theenginaale Avargalil Meedhiyaagiravargalum Thappugiravargalumillai Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

18 en Kobamum En Ukkiramum Erusalemin Kudigalmel Eppadi Moondadho, Appadiye En Ukkiram Neengal Egipthukkup Pogumpodhu, Ungalmel Moolum. Neengal Saabamaagavum Paazhaagavum Pazhippaagavum Nindhaiyaagavum Irundhu, Ivvidaththai Inikkaanaadhiruppeergal Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalinkarththar Sollugiraar.
19 yoodhaavil Meedhiyaanavargale, Egipthukkup Pogaadhirungal Endru Karththar Ungalaik Kuriththu Sonnaarenbadhai Innaalile Ungalukku Saatchiyaaga Ariviththen Endru Ariyungal.

20 ungal Aaththumaakkalukku Virodhamaai Ungalai Mosampokkineergal; Nee Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nokki: Engalukkaaga Vinnappampanni, Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Solvadhaiyellaam Engalukku Arivikkavendum; Adhinpadiye Seyvom Endru Neengal Solli, Ennai Ungal Dhevanaagiyakarththaridaththukku Anuppineergal.
21 naan Innaalil Adhai Ungalukku Ariviththen; Aanaalum, Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Saththaththukkum, Avar Ennaikkondu Ungalukku Solliyanuppina Endhakkaariyaththukkum Sevikodaamarponeergal.
22 ippodhum Thangiyiruppadharku Neengal Poga Virumbugira Sthalaththil Thaane Pattayaththaalum, Panjaththaalum, Kollainoyaalum Saaveergalendru Nichchayamaai Ariyungal Endraan.
